## PARAMETERS

```{r }

# foret = 3, savanna = 4, pasture = 15, soybean = 39, other temp.crops = 41, per.crops = 36

year = 2019


```

## LOADING & MERGING files


```{r }

list_lsm <- list()

for (i in 1:1032){

    WD.tmp = list.files(path=dir_data, pattern = paste0("Basin_",i,"_"), full.names = TRUE)

    list_lsm[[i]] <- get(load(file=file.path(WD.tmp, paste0(year, "_mapbiomas_lsm",i,".RData")))) 
    
 
}

df_lsm <- do.call("rbind",list_lsm) %>% filter(metric=='pland', class == 15|class == 41) %>% dplyr::select(metric, ID, class, value)  %>% spread(class, value) %>% drop_na() %>% dplyr::rename(pasture='15', tcrop='41')

df_lsm
```

## PLOTTING


```{r }


ggplot(df_lsm) + 
  geom_point(aes(x=pasture,y=tcrop), show.legend = FALSE, alpha=0.2) +
  scale_y_continuous(limits = c(0,10))+ 
  labs(title = paste0(" % ", lu.name," per hydrobasin ", year), x="pasture", y="tcrop")+ 
  theme_bw()+
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(size = 12), axis.title.x = element_text(size = 10, vjust = 1.5, hjust=1),
        axis.text.y = element_text(size = 12), axis.title.y = element_text(size = 10, angle = 0, vjust=1.05),
        plot.title = element_text(size = 10, face = "bold", hjust=0.5))





```
